title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 151.8 - Formation of tows
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 151.8 - Formation of tows

State Regulations

Fleet formation of two loaded barges abreast is permitted
in the canalized river and lake sections of the canal. Such formation shall not
be used in other sections of the canal without the written permission of the

Canal Corporation. Where difficulty is experienced in holding light fleets
within the buoyed channels, the Canal Corporation or its representative may
order such formation and devices for control as in its judgment will best
protect the buoys. Failure to comply with such orders will subject the operator
of the towing tug to a penalty not to exceed $100. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
151.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
